title: Amazing Stories Volume 05 Number 05
creator: Sloane, Thomas O'Conor, 1851-1940

Hamilton, Edmond Moore, 1904-1977

Peters, Woods
description: Amazing Stories, volume 5, number 5 (August 1930). Scanned copy of a pulp magazine published by Experimenter Publications, Inc. and edited by Thomas O'Conor Sloane, Ph.D. Periodical copyright not renewed. Individual contributions' copyrights not renewed. This magazine and its contents are now in the public domain. Featuring: Skylark Three (Edward E. Smith; 1/3), The Mystery of Professor Brown (A. L. Hodges), South Polar Berylium, Limited (Peter Van Dresser), World Atavism (Edmond Hamilton), The Last War (S. P. Meek), and When Inca-Land Revolted (Woods Peters).
